website_summaries.verdict: A winning wide-body label maker, the Brother QL-1100 prints to a variety of label stock from your PC, Mac, or mobile device, and it comes with nifty label-design software and mobile apps.
pros: Good print quality, for a label printer
cons: Consumables somewhat costly on a per-label basis

customer_reviews.title: YAYYYYYYYYY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a Dymo 4XL for about a year now, and it is the worst. I was so unhappy with it that I literally threw it on the floor. It survived that, unfortunately, but recently it's been spitting out 3-4 blank labels for every one that I print, so I decided it's time for an upgrade. This Brother printer is so amazing in comparison. It's just WAY WAY WAY WAY better. Moral of the story- don't buy a POS Dymo. Buy this and trust me that it's a far better investment in your mental health/stress levels/general quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: 2percentOwl

customer_reviews.title: Works great with 4" x 6" Generic Shipping Labels
customer_reviews.text: We love this label printer! It is working great for printing 4x6 shipping labels directly from Etsy, and it works great with the Generic Shipping Labels (listed as Compatible w/ Brother DK-1241 101mm x 152mm(4" x 6")) by BETCKEY.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY_USER INTERFACE SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst piece of garbage. Whoever designed this user interface and all of the hoops you have to jump through in the right order to even print one label needs to be fired and never work again designing user interfaces. It is horrible. I cannot get it to print on my mac. I have followed every instruction and the paper sizes and it gives me various error messages or it says it is printing and does NOTHING. Be warned this printer hates Macs.
customer_reviews.author: Shishi

customer_reviews.title: JUNK, you have to download their software to print labels and do 1,000 steps.
customer_reviews.text: I have a macbook pro and this thing is a pain. You have to take 1,000 steps before printing one label. I was hoping it would be easier than what I do now which is printing half sheet labels directly from any website (etsy, amazon, ebay) but no, this thing took 4 hours of my time trying to figure it out and trying their ptouch program. You have to download each label and then crop it in adobe reader, then put it in their ptouch and print the blurry label. I am returning this and getting a dymo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small Business? This is the one you want.
customer_reviews.text: It literally took less than 5 minutes from the time I opened the box until I had it set up and working. I have a small business and this printer is EXACTLY what I needed. It doesn't take up much space. It couldn't be easier to load the labels. The label spools also contain markings so the printer can automatically detect the label size. The labels may cost a few cents more for this model, but it's worth every penny. The time savings alone offset the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great for making shipping labels
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this one has such low reviews. I love the brother QL 1050 I had and also love this one. We use them to print thousands of shipping labels and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: UT Kilts

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!! Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love my label printer!! I watched a YouTube video that received this printer but the wireless version and fell in love! I have model QL-1100 with the usb cord and couldn’t be happier. I love that I don’t have to worry about loosing connection it’s just plugged I. 24/7 to my Mac Pro . * to print from PayPal (my shipping labels) for my small business: 1. Download to laptop 2. Then hit print once the download image pops up 3. Ensure settings on PayPal (under a different brand are at 4x6) 4. Print page settings set at 4x6 and there it is!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Chavez

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION! PROPRIETARY LABELS!
customer_reviews.text: Be advised.. This printer used a proprietary "cartridge" type of label with a data encoding set of pins in the bottom of the label well which prevents you from using any standard 4x6 label forcing you to buy their "special" labels. This was not clear to me in by the product description and was only let in on this little surprise once I started to set the device up.
customer_reviews.author: Travis R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup. Great print quality.
customer_reviews.text: Given the number of mixed reviews on this product, I was initially hesitant to purchase. But I'm so glad I did! Setup was easy and straightforward. I had no issues installing the drivers on my PC. I love the fact that the unit comes with 2 sample size label rolls so I could start printing right away. Printing the labels is easy and I'm impressed with both the speed of printing and the quality. Love that the machine cuts the labels for you.
customer_reviews.author: juliewoo

customer_reviews.title: Works with BETCKEY labels. Great printer!
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m pleased! I was worried with the reviews that my “off brand” BETCKEY labels would not print out correctly, and to my surprise they worked perfectly fine. I use USPS website and followed the instructions from Brother website to save my label to pdf using Adobe, and then screenshot the image and print the label to the size labels I have. You simply change the label size on print options and it prints perfect! Very professional look. I’m not super tech savvy, but it didn’t take me too long to get everything downloaded to my laptop and ready for use. Maybe less than 1 hour. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Sky J.

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with UPS application.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product because we wanted to print out UPS shipping labels as we use their services weekly. Unfortunately, it does not print UPS shipping labels. If this is not an issue with you, then it'll work fine. However, as a product that prints shipping labels, its description or notes should annotate a lack of compatibility or capability to work with certain applications. Overall rating of 2 stars due to not being able to use this product for our purposes and process of returning; not meeting our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: love this printer. i had gotten the rollo based on the reviews it printed way to light and i just didn’t like how there was no storage for the paper. it was also just so off looking .. this prints to dark! i love how it cuts the paper for you. easy to set up. the paper is easy to pop in . it’s also cute
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Working with ShipStation... Using a MacBook...
customer_reviews.text: This printer is not on SS supported list and they even tested it. It works now. For a Mac use CUPS printing. After installation it worked the first time. Not a fan of only Brother labels (expensive), but I will be looking for a way around that. Worked with UPS and FedEx directly as well. Recommend the printer.
customer_reviews.author: ZeightyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is the one printer you need for all of your label making needs. The software is reasonably flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Mccallister

customer_reviews.title: Great for shipping labels
customer_reviews.text: purchased a dymo label maker and i didn't realize it didn't print large slips like this one. love it. so much easier than manually printing each shipping label for orders and taping it to the package. also love that it doesn't require ink. great investment and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Regina B.

customer_reviews.title: Very little setup needed
customer_reviews.text: Great for eBay labels. Prints super fast directly from the eBay sold page. Just plug it in, install drivers, win
customer_reviews.author: smitty

customer_reviews.title: I am smart, but after 3 hours I give up
customer_reviews.text: Been a Mac guy, had many printers. Very easy.. however, this unit I just can't figure out. always saying paper size error. Read brothers troubleshoot over and over. I just can't get it to print. Even in the application as a test print, it always says paper error. I've got it set at 4x6 and 4.07 x 6.04. About to give up. It should not be that frustrating of a printer. I exported to PDF, chose the printer, put sizes in. Nope! I only put this review after 3 hours of trying to figure it out and 15 minutes of customer service just hanging up on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved me a ton of money!
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of buying printer ink and shipped around and decided on this one. Prints clean as long as the image is clean. I'm using paper that isn't brother brand and no issues. Comes with print software that I almost never use. Over all happy as this saves me money on paper and ink! And it's a much smaller footprint on my desk!
customer_reviews.author: Zacofalltraides

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. Use it for all labels. Ebay is simple one touch print. Usps or ups FedEx, need to save label to desktop and use snapshot from Adobe and print.
customer_reviews.author: John Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I wish that the shipping label print out just one click. There are couple steps you have to do before you be able to print the label. But I’m ok with that it work perfectly for my Etsy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So happy I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Recently opened my online boutique and I have a website through Shopify! The label printer makes everything 30x easier! So happy I made the choice to got with a brother printer opposed to a cheaper brand I never heard of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stellar little product.
customer_reviews.text: We print the back labels for our coffee bags with this. Very good little printer. Easy to setup, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Technology Instructor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use! Love this printer!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this postage printer! It was so easy to set up and easy to use. I also love that it comes with labels so it is ready to use right out of the box. And since it is a Thermal printer, you never have to buy ink! If you are still trying to decide which printer to get, I highly suggest this one.
customer_reviews.author: JEA

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just got started. Printed two shipping labels so far for eBay sales.
customer_reviews.author: electrofex

customer_reviews.title: Only can use brother genuine labels
customer_reviews.text: This printer doesn't allow to use free UPS labels. Printer price is reasonable but need to purchase expensive genuine brother labels. It is wasting money.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT print lables upward like photo
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT print labels upward like photo - they print face down therefore if you use certain rolls this will NOT work even with adapter to use any roll. Stickers on roll MUST be face down - most rolls sold are with stickers face up. Photo is NOT correct!
customer_reviews.author: DEE FIN

customer_reviews.title: worst printer ever have
customer_reviews.text: connecting a printer should be easy, i have never used this hard printer, technical support so fun, they dont know anything about the printer
customer_reviews.author: Mike Deem

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than the other brand I was using! Great product and great service!
customer_reviews.author: GenX Performance

customer_reviews.title: Save time at the post office
customer_reviews.text: I love This machine!! Easy to use. Prints so fast and saves me time at the post office.
customer_reviews.author: Briana McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Easy use for a guy who doesn't use computers alot.🤣
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, I watched a few videos on how to print and I followed the instructions it was easy as that. I just switched from a regular printer and this by far is way better for selling and shipping packages. Btw you need a cord if you would like to use your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: No tech support to have  shipping labels for Ebay
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this machine no tech support This is the waist of time and money it doesn't print the right size from Ebay and no one to help I will try again after days of trying and keep an update garbage no one to help if you like to have problem buy this printer
customer_reviews.author: Frey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I print a decent amount of labels. Love how quick and easy it is.
customer_reviews.author: KenGuch

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work after multiple different printers.
customer_reviews.text: Would give it a zero if I could. Tried two of them & couldn’t get either of them to work. Bought a dymo & it worked right away.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Baumgart

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The printer works great! Simple installation. Great quality, good speed!
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Betckey replace roll
customer_reviews.text: The printer works great, love it, but the replacement roll I ordered through Betckey at the same time did not and I tried it several times. I finally ordered a Brother replacement and it worked first try.
customer_reviews.author: Kama Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed an easy printer for printing address labels and postage. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: JackV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Printer
customer_reviews.text: This machine have quick booting response and also have good quality of printing. Highly recommended this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chang

customer_reviews.title: Can’t print
customer_reviews.text: This printer is really bad!! Worst printer ever. Do not!! I repeat don’t spoil your hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Moilorba Konneh

customer_reviews.title: Best shipping label ever
customer_reviews.text: Best shipping label for online businesses for top quality results
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried hooking this up for 4 days now. I’ve called customer service 3 times and they told me in order to use the printer I have to buy $70 drivers to install on my iPhone. Basically I paid $190 for a thermal printer for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Not wireless.
customer_reviews.text: Since it’s 2018 I assumed this was gonna be wireless but it’s not :/. However, the do make a wireless one! 1100-NWB
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gallardo

product_meta.title: Brother QL-1100 Wide Format, Postage and Barcode Professional Thermal Label Printer, Black
product_meta.description:
The Brother QL-1100 Wide Format Professional Thermal Label Printer addresses the increasing demand for highly reliable, cost-effective business label printers to consistently and quickly print high-quality up to 4-inch labels - perfect for shipping and postage. The Brother QL-1100 delivers 300 dpi resolution and prints up to 69 labels per minute(1) minimizing the time spent waiting for labels. Its built-in automatic heavy-duty cutter is ideal for handling large print jobs and provides a clean, professional edge when using continuous tapes.

The Brother QL-1100 includes a USB cable, label creation software and a starter supply of labels so it’s ready to use right out of the box. The QL-1100 is compatible with Windows and Mac and integrates with Microsoft Word, Excel, and Outlook. It also offers a USB host interface for use with peripheral devices including scanners. The Plug & Play feature enables you to create and print labels without the need to install software on your Windows PC, making it simple to use. The easy-to-use, drop-in DK replacement tape rolls make it a breeze to change supplies; there’s no ink or toner to replace – ever. The QL-1100 also detects the size of the tape in the machine and automatically adjusts the onscreen template.

The automatic crop function lets on-line sellers easily print product and other barcode labels from A4/Letter size label sheet templates (Windows only). You can print an entire sheet of labels or a section of labels with virtually no waste. Brother network management tools make it easy to integrate and manage the label printer on any network. The free Software Development Kit (SDK) is available for Windows, iOS and Android for custom application development. Brother provides email and phone support to developers and software integrators. The Brother QL-1100 combines fast and easy professional output with the low-maintenance requirements of direct thermal printing.

(1) Based on using standard address labels, text only at 300 x 300 dpi

All referenced trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective companies. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. Mac is a registered trademark of Apple Inc. We recommend using genuine Brother DK label supplies for best performance, as they're engineered to print high-quality labels with your Brother QL printer.
feature_bullets: Prints on wide format labels up to 4” wide: Perfect for printing mailing, address and postage labels for packages along with visitor and name badges
Barcode crop function: No more printing sheets of barcodes. Now, easily crop and select barcodes and UPCs for printing from templates (Windows only)
USB host interface: Enables use with peripheral devices such as a scanner and is compact enough to sit on any packing station or desk
“Plug & label” feature: Lets you create and print labels without the need to install software on Windows PCs
Free software development kits (SDK): Easily integrate using free SDKs for Windows & Android systems.Printer Memory (MB):7.8

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars126 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
